I honestly love this game. Even though we all know that the way some people play is frustrating, we have got to appreciate the great creativity, love, and effort put into this game. The fact that the company pays lots of money for character rights so we can play people and killers we all know and love from our favorite horror movies is so amazing, and as an artist, I really am amazed how accurately they recreated those characters.

Gameplay wise it is also a very fun and addicting game. For someone who loves the teamwork and battling the fps games offer, but has horrible aim and gets bored of the same repeating concept, DBD is such a great refreshing alternative. It is fun for people who are not a god at video games, but to get up in those higher ranks it takes a lot of skill and strategy, and just knowledge of game mechanics. So it is a very fun game for gamers of all skill. Plus I love horror, so to actually play a game where I am running away from a killer (with my friends!) and I get to play a killer and hunt people down is awesome! The game itself is pretty well balanced on both sides as well. I can run away and loop killers around objects easily one time and then maybe get completely dominated in another match. Or vice versa. I can wipe a whole team of survivors or get ran around by them the whole game. It just depends on the skill of your opponent. And thats what makes this game so fun! Anyways if your still not convinced, think about this:

If your a horror fan or a gamer who loves to play with friends and want to play a new refreshing game that is always updating with new content then please, just get the game <3
Excelente juego, por favor no lo dejen morir uNu queremos mas jugadores porque es lo mehor si no cogio burra no tuvo infancia

ItÂ´s a very unbalanced Killer-Survivor game, frustrating hitboxes, texture and object glitches, certain objects canÂ´t be interacted with, a totally crap matchmaking system, Lobbysim, a hud wich isnÂ´t nice for gameplay reasons, certain bugs in interactions and movement, hellish serverlags, because of crossplay (wich you are unable to turn off, when you are playing swf, wich is frustrating af), oh yeah and there is a time ban if your game crashes or disconnect, wich doesnÂ´t work propably ...

Should I go on with the biggest problem?
Yes?

The Devs of this game donÂ´t even care about the things their community suggest/ want/ need.
They just sh*t out more content for the sake of money, then trying to fix old problems or to listen to their community.


I think I now have enough hours, in this game, to say, that itÂ´s going constantly downhill... Sorry...

I main as Huntress the Killer, and although some people have warned me that she is just an "eh" character, she can be such a brutal killer if played with some good perks. I love the design that is put into the game, although it takes FOREVER to find a public match when my friends aren't on. Overall, this game is definitely worth the $20 for hours of psychotic killing :)

el juego esta muy bueno, no tiene mala comunidad y recibe actualizaciones seguido. Recomendable para jugar con amigos. Me parece un poco "pay to win" que te puedas comprar asesinos con habilidades poderosas pero  se puede jugar bien igual.

In some ways its good game. But : 
- no matchmaking, so you can as newbie, play vs top ranks. And when you play killer, they just troll you, bait you and have fun from you. Ofc in chat after game too. 
- bad bad BAD maps. And they want add much more blocked doors, couse then think "it is so funny" as killer, where enemy top rank survs. repair 2 gens in 2 mins, have time to destroy some **** blocked doors to hunt this survs ...
- rly BAD balance where survs > killer. 
- toxic but rly much toxic players (in game and ofc in chat too)
- you can buy skins, characters and PERKs?! (p2w!!!) for ingame currency, but it take incredible much time!

So its like much other games. Good idea, but devs detroy it :/ (RiP Evolve 2)
